trapomino

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • trapomino.Entity

  • public class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
    This class creates, initializes, and manages the class variables used by the Entities in the Game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Entity()
      This constructor sets all of the class variables assigned above to their default values.
      Entity(int xPos, int yPos, int width, int height)
      This constructor sets all of the class variables assigned above to the given variables.
      Entity(int xPos, int yPos, int width, int height, java.awt.image.BufferedImage image)
      This constructor sets all of the class variables assigned above to the given variables.
      Entity(int xPos, int yPos, int width, int height, int[] pic_ID)
      This constructor sets all of the class variables assigned above to the given variables.
      Entity(int xPos, int yPos, int width, int height, int xVol, int yVol)
      This constructor sets all of the class variables assigned above to the given variables.
      Entity(int xPos, int yPos, int width, int height, int xVol, int yVol, java.awt.image.BufferedImage image)
      This constructor sets all of the class variables assigned above to the given variables.
      Entity(int xPos, int yPos, int width, int height, int xVol, int yVol, int[] pic_ID)
      This constructor sets all of the class variables assigned above to the given variables.
      Entity(int xPos, int yPos, int width, int height, int xVol, int yVol, java.lang.String image)
      This constructor sets all of the class variables assigned above to the given variables.
      Entity(int xPos, int yPos, int width, int height, java.lang.String image)
      This constructor sets all of the class variables assigned above to the given variables.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Position getGridPosition()
      This method returns the current Position the Entity occupies.
      int getHeight()
      This method returns the height of the Entity's sprite.
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage getImage()
      This method returns the Entity's sprite as an Image.
      java.awt.Rectangle getRectangle()
      This method returns the Entity's position and size as a rectangle.
      int getWidth()
      This method returns the width of the Entity's sprite.
      int getXPosition()
      This method returns the Entity's X coordinate.
      int getXVelocity()
      This method returns the Entity's horizontal velocity.
      int getYPosition()
      This method returns the Entity's Y coordinate.
      int getYVelocity()
      This method returns the Entity's vertical velocity.
      void render(java.awt.Graphics g)
      This method updates the Position of the Entity based on it's velocities, then renders the Entity on the frame.
      void setHieght(int height)
      This method sets the Entity's height to the given value.
      void setImage(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image)
      This method sets the Entity's sprite Image to the one given.
      void setImage(java.lang.String imageFile)
      This method sets the Entity's sprite Image to the one corresponding to the given name in the Graphics folder of Trapomino.
      void setRectangle()
      This method sets the Entity's hitbox to a Rectangle with its current X and Y coordinates, width, and height.
      void setWidth(int width)
      This method sets the Entity's width to the given value.
      void setXPosition(int xPos)
      This method sets the Entity's X coordinate to the given value.
      void setXVelocity(int xVol)
      This method sets the Entity's horizontal velocity to the given value.
      void setYPosition(int yPos)
      This method sets the Entity's Y coordinate to the given value.
      void setYVelocity(int yVol)
      This method sets the Entity's vertical velocity to the given value.

              int yPos,
              int width,
              int height)
        This constructor sets all of the class variables assigned above to the given variables.
        Parameters:
        xPos - - the X coordinate of the Entity
        yPos - - the Y coordinate of the Entity
        width - - the width of the Entity's sprite and Shape
        height - - the height of the Entity's sprite and Shape

      • setImage

        public void setImage(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image)
        This method sets the Entity's sprite Image to the one given.
        Parameters:
        image - - the Entity's new sprite Image

      • setImage

        public void setImage(java.lang.String imageFile)
        This method sets the Entity's sprite Image to the one corresponding to the given name in the Graphics folder of Trapomino. If it encounters an error while loading or assigning the image, it writes an error to the ErrorLogger.
        Parameters:
        imageFile - - the file name of the Entity's sprite

      • render

        public void render(java.awt.Graphics g)
        This method updates the Position of the Entity based on it's velocities, then renders the Entity on the frame.
        Parameters:
        g - - the Graphics class to draw the sprite with
